name: Salary Calculator
description: Caclulate your Monthly Salary from an Hourly Salary.
seoDescription: Caclulate your Monthly Salary from an Hourly Salary. Free online calculator from TOOLTOOLITO
articleTitle: How to Caclulate your Monthly Salary

article.p1: To Caclulate your monthly salary you need to multiply the hourly wage by hours worked a week and then multiply for four weeks.
article.p2: example: 12$ per hour with a 9 hr workday and 5 days in a week  = (12 * 9 * 5 * 4) =  2160$  Monthly
